Tastebudz Syndicate Best Autoflowering Strains 2024 

 

19. Biscotti 33 Strain Autoflower Seeds

Dive into a whirlwind adventure with the extraordinary Tastebudz Biscotti 33 Autoflower strain! This unique autoflowering hybrid marries the fruity splendor of Gelato #33 with the deep relaxation of Sour Kush, delivering a fast flowering period and bountiful yields. Perfect for both beginner and veteran growers, this strain is your ticket to a flourishing cannabis garden.

Strain Information

Strain Name: Biscotti 33 Autoflower
Strain Breeder: Tastebudz Syndicate
Lineage: Gelato #33 x Sour Kush
Genetics: 70% Indica / 30% Sativa
Flowering Type: Autoflower
Sex: Feminized
Flowering Time: 7-8 weeks
Effect: Relaxing, uplifting
Aroma: Fruity, pungent
Taste: Fruity, herbal
Height: Compact
Yield: Up to 400 g/m² indoors, generous outdoor yields

 

Strain Description

Tastebudz Biscotti 33 Autoflower is a masterpiece in cannabis breeding, combining the delightful flavours of Gelato #33 with the soothing effects of Sour Kush. With a dominant 70% Indica profile, it delivers profound relaxation without sacrificing mental clarity. This strain’s rapid flowering and high-yielding nature make it an excellent choice for those with limited space but lofty ambitions.

Growing Information

Biscotti 33 Autoflower flourishes both indoors and outdoors, adapting effortlessly to diverse environments thanks to its autoflowering characteristics. Perfect for growers seeking a swift turnaround, it boasts indoor yields of up to 400 g/m² and abundant outdoor harvests.

Strain Flavour and Aromas

This strain boasts a rich terpene profile featuring Linalool, Alpha Pinene, and Limonene, creating a complex mix of fruity and herbal aromas with a refreshing, pungent twist. The flavour profile echoes the aroma, delivering a deliciously enjoyable experience reminiscent of its dessert-inspired name.

Strain Lineage

Biscotti 33 Autoflower harmoniously blends the creamy, citrusy essence of Gelato #33 with the earthy, kushy undertones of Sour Kush, crafting a balanced hybrid that satisfies a wide array of tastes and preferences.

Strain Summary

Tastebudz Biscotti 33 is the ultimate choice for those who appreciate rapid flowering and generous yields without compromising on quality. Its balanced effects and rich flavour profile make it a versatile strain suitable for any occasion. Whether you’re unwinding after a long day or sparking your creative energy, Biscotti 33 Autoflower is guaranteed to elevate your cannabis experience.

 

18. Yuzu Sour Strain Autoflower Seeds

Step into the invigorating realm of Tastebudz Yuzu Sour Autoflower, a captivating hybrid that promises swift harvests and intense flavours. This strain, boasting a distinctive blend of Critical, Lemoncello, and Mimosa, is an essential for those who savour vibrant citrus notes and powerful effects.

 

Strain Information

Strain Name: Yuzu Sour Autoflower
Strain Breeder: Tastebudz
Lineage: Critical x Lemoncello x Mimosa
Genetics: Slightly Indica-dominant
Flowering Type: Autoflower
Sex: Feminized
Flowering Time: 7-8 weeks
Effect: Relaxing, uplifting
Aroma: Diesel, lemon, mandarin
Taste: Sour citrus, diesel
Height: Compact
Yield: Up to 500 g/m² indoors, 500-600 g/plant outdoors

 

Strain Description

Tastebudz Yuzu Sour Autoflower is a brilliant creation crafted for both efficiency and flavour. With a robust THC content of 28%, this strain is ideal for those seeking a potent blend of relaxation and uplifting effects. Its fast flowering time of 7-8 weeks makes it a preferred option for growers desiring rapid results without sacrificing quality.

Growing Information

Yuzu Sour Autoflower excels in both indoor and outdoor environments, thanks to its compact growth habit. It’s perfect for growers requiring discretion but still wanting generous yields. This strain is easy to cultivate, making it suitable for beginners and experienced cultivators alike.

Strain Flavour and Aromas

This strain is rich with the zesty scents of lemon and mandarin, underpinned by a distinct diesel note. Its terpene profile, featuring Myrcene, Limonene, and Caryophyllene, enhances its sharp, sour citrus taste, making each puff a delightfully aromatic experience.

Strain Lineage

Yuzu Sour Autoflower inherits its sturdy genetics from Critical, Lemoncello, and Mimosa, combining the best relaxing and sensory-enhancing traits of these renowned strains.

Strain Summary

Tastebudz Yuzu Sour Autoflower is a standout choice for cannabis connoisseurs who value quick-flowering strains that deliver on flavour and potency. Its harmonious blend of sour and sweet citrus flavours, coupled with a high that relaxes and invigorates, makes Yuzu Sour Autoflower an exceptional addition to any collection.

 

17. MAC Muffin Strain Autoflower Seeds

Welcome to the delightful world of Tastebudz MAC Muffin Autoflower, a strain crafted for both new and experienced growers. This strain seamlessly combines the decadent aroma of blueberry muffins with a hint of spice, delivering a soothing, therapeutic experience that will be a cherished addition to any collection.

 

Strain Information

Strain Name: MAC Muffin Autoflower
Strain Breeder: Tastebudz
Lineage: Alien Cookies x Starfighter x Blueberry Kush
Genetics: 70% Indica / 30% Sativa
Flowering Type: Autoflower
Sex: Feminized
Flowering Time: 60-70 days
Effect: Relaxing, therapeutic
Aroma: Blueberry muffin, spice
Taste: Blueberry, spicy notes
Height: Compact
Yield: Up to 500 g/m² indoors; up to 150 g/plant outdoors

 

Strain Description

Tastebudz MAC Muffin Autoflower is like a treat for your senses, filling the air with the sweet and comforting aroma of freshly baked blueberry muffins. This strain, with its 70% Indica and 30% Sativa composition, offers a relaxing effect without causing heavy sedation. Its THC level of around 21% makes it ideal for easing into relaxation or alleviating pain.

Growing Information

MAC Muffin Autoflower thrives in various growing conditions, making it perfect for both indoor and outdoor gardens. This robust plant is known for its vigorous growth, producing dense, resin-coated buds that showcase its premium genetic heritage.

Strain Flavour and Aromas

MAC Muffin Autoflower tantalizes the palate with a blend of sweet blueberries and a hint of spice, creating a complex and enticing flavour profile. Rich in terpenes like Alpha Pinene, Myrcene, and Caryophyllene, this strain offers a taste as deep and inviting as its aroma.

Strain Lineage

The genetic lineage of MAC Muffin Autoflower is a cross between the dessert-like Alien Cookies, the strong Starfighter, and the aromatic Blueberry Kush, highlighting its rich and diverse genetic heritage.

Strain Summary

Tastebudz MAC Muffin Autoflower is a top-notch choice for those seeking a high-yield, easy-to-grow plant with a unique flavour profile. Perfect for unwinding after a long day or alleviating discomfort, its balanced effects and enticing aroma make it a standout choice for any cannabis aficionado.

 

16. Gorilla Gas Strain Autoflower Seeds

Discover the dynamic allure of Gorilla Gas Autoflower from Tastebudz Syndicate, a potent hybrid that merges the powerful genetics of Chemdawg, GMO (Garlic, Mushroom, Onion), and GG4 Auto. Crafted for those who seek profound physical relaxation combined with a hefty 25% THC punch, this strain is ideal for growers looking for rapid results without compromising on excellence. Gorilla Gas is a standout in the autoflowering world.

Strain Name: Gorilla Gas Autoflower
Strain Breeder: Tastebudz Syndicate
Lineage: Chemdawg x GMO x GG4 Auto
Genetics: Predominantly Indica
Flowering Type: Autoflower
Sex: Feminized
Flowering Time: 8-9 weeks
Effect: Deeply relaxing and enduring
Aroma: Lemon diesel with a peppery kick
Taste: Exotic lemon and diesel
Height: Compact
Yield: Up to 450 g/m² indoors, 130 g/plant outdoors

 

Strain Description

Gorilla Gas Autoflower by Tastebudz Syndicate provides an exceptional physical relaxation experience, thanks to its high THC content, making it perfect for evening use or unwinding after a busy day. Its rapid flowering time and ease of growth make it an ideal choice for both novice and experienced growers.

Growing Information

Gorilla Gas is incredibly easy to cultivate due to its autoflowering nature, requiring minimal upkeep over a shorter growth cycle. It thrives in both indoor and outdoor environments, delivering abundant yields in a compact structure.

Strain Flavour and Aromas

This strain features a bold flavour profile dominated by lemon diesel and enriched with spicy, peppery notes, creating a rich and complex taste experience. The aroma complements the taste with similar citrus and diesel nuances, offering a treat for the senses.

Strain Lineage

Gorilla Gas Autoflower inherits its robust qualities from a lineage of cannabis titans—Chemdawg, GMO, and GG4 Auto—each contributing to its strength, flavour, and resin production.

Strain Summary

Tastebudz Syndicate’ Gorilla Gas Autoflower is a prime example of autoflowering excellence, combining swift growth with potent effects and rich flavours. Its high THC content and rapid lifecycle enable cultivators to efficiently produce top-tier buds. This strain is not only a powerful therapeutic option but also a delight for recreational users seeking deep relaxation and a memorable flavour experience.

 

15. Purple Punch Strain Autoflower Seeds

Step into the vibrant world of Purple Punch Autoflower, expertly curated by Tastebudz Syndicate. Strain Information

Strain Name: Purple Punch Autoflower
Strain Breeder: Tastebudz Syndicate
Lineage: Grape Ape x OG Kush Auto
Genetics: Predominantly Indica
Flowering Type: Autoflower
Sex: Feminised

Height: Compact
Yield: Up to 400 g/m² indoors, over 600 g per plant outdoors

This Indica-dominant autoflower excels in a variety of environments, showcasing strong resistance to mould and pests. It matures swiftly, making it suitable for multiple harvests throughout the year, especially in regions with shorter growing seasons.

Purple Punch Autoflower boasts a rich terpene profile including Alpha Cedrene, Alpha Pinene, Beta Caryophyllene, Borneol, Cadinene, and Camphene. This results in a complex aroma of sweet grapes and tropical undertones, making each puff a delightful experience.

Strain Lineage

Derived from a cross of Grape Ape, known for its fruity grape aroma, and OG Kush Auto, which contributes to its robustness and quick flowering cycle, Purple Punch Autoflower stands out with its superior genetic background.

Strain Summary

Tastebudz Syndicate’ Purple Punch Autoflower is a stellar strain that is both easy to grow and yields generous amounts of premium buds. Its unique grape soda flavour is a favourite among fruity strain enthusiasts, while its therapeutic properties provide gentle relaxation, perfect for relieving muscle tension and unwinding after a long day. This strain is ideal for growers looking for a blend of efficiency and effectiveness, all wrapped in a deliciously aromatic package.
